title: Black Moon
description: Slade saved her life...but none of that matters anymore... Torn between her love for Slade and her own existence, Hope has to fight to keep one while battling to save the other. They say it all falls apart in the end. Walking away isn’t always easy.Hope believed in Slade…But sometimes belief has a horrible way of destroying your life.Can their love survive or will it all just fall apart?
author: Holly Hood
